com.scene7.qa.benchmark
Class Classifier

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class Classifier
extends BaseServlet

A class contains methods to categorize test cases using "category" and "description".

Version:
Jul 25, 2012
Author:
hewong

Returns:
longest substring in common

setCommonSubstring

protected void setCommonSubstring(java.lang.String s)
Check string and put all substring permutations into term frequency table.
Algorithm steps: 
 String A = "Hello world";
 1) put key "H" to count value =  1
 2) put key "He" to count value =  1
 3) put key"Hel" to count value =  1
 ...
 
 String B = "Hell boy";
 1) update key "H" to count value =  2
 2) update key "He" to count value =  2
 3) update key "Hel" to count value =  2

Parameters:
s - current string to check against term frequency table

buildCategoryDescription

protected void buildCategoryDescription(java.lang.String category,
                                        java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                        DatabaseHandler db,
                                        Status status)
Update categories and descriptions of all test cases in database.
Category will be pre-determined, description will be the substring remaining after subtracting the category string.
Example: 
 String category = "www.s7IsAwesome.com";
 String url = "www.s7IsAwesome.com/is/imaging/test1.php";
 then description would be "/is/imaging/test1.php";

When rebuilding categories and descriptions, it would only affect test cases that do not have category and description.

Parameters:
category - desired category name
rs - affected test cases result set
db - database handler
status - used for progress bar

nullCategoryDescription

private boolean nullCategoryDescription(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
Helper function to check and see if category or description of a given test case has not been set.

Parameters:
rs - test case result set pointer
Returns:
if category or description is null

resetCategoryDescription

protected void resetCategoryDescription(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                        DatabaseHandler db,
                                        Status status)
Reset all test case categories and descriptions back to null.
Used for internal testing purpose.
Note: Currently disabled. To enable this function, need to enable "reset" button in CategoryServlet.class.

Parameters:
rs - result set of given test case
db - database handler
status - progress bar object
